Heading: Welcome to my online portfolio!
Body: My most recent role as a game developer has provided me with the necessary skills to operate within various development teams, adopting industry standards and procedures in producing high quality software. I am a recent graduate seeking work in the software engineering industry, looking to constantly improve and refine my abilities.

I am extremely passionate in the field of development, and have experience in a range of outputs including games, tools, and frameworks. I look forward to applying these skills within a business environment and hope to create applications of polished quality.
